CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The full width at half - maximum ( fwhm ) of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) film is 324 nm , which is nearly a double that of P3HT film ( 158 nm ).

Let's think step by step.

1. PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) film: This is a single material entity mentioned in the paragraph.
2. P3HT film: This is another material entity mentioned in the paragraph.

So, the material entities in the paragraph are PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) and P3HT.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

The material entities in the paragraph are:

1. PDTP-DTDPP(Bu)
2. P3HT

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The full width at half - maximum ( fwhm ) of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) film is 324 nm , which is nearly a double that of P3HT film ( 158 nm ).

Let's think step by step.

1. fwhm (Full width at half-maximum)
2. PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) film
3. P3HT film
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. fwhm (Full width at half-maximum)
2. PDTP-DTDPP(Bu)
3. P3HT (P3HT is a material, PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) is also a material)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Full width at half-maximum (fwhm) |
| PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) film |
| P3HT film |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The full width at half - maximum ( fwhm ) of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) film is 324 nm , which is nearly a double that of P3HT film ( 158 nm ).

Let's think step by step.

1. fwhm of PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) film: 324 nm
2. fwhm of P3HT film: 158 nm

These are the property values mentioned in the paragraph. The full width at half maximum (fwhm) is a measure of the width of a spectral line or band, often used in spectroscopy. In this context, it refers to the width of the emission or absorption band of the PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) and P3HT films.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. fwhm of PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) film: 324 nm
2. fwhm of P3HT film: 158 nm

These are the entities that clearly refer to the values of material properties mentioned in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| fwhm of PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) film: 324 nm |
| fwhm of P3HT film: 158 nm |
